00036   uint32_t pin;

00041 } GPIOINT_CallbackDesc_t;

00048 /* Array of user callbacks. One for each pin. */
00049 static GPIOINT_IrqCallbackPtr_t gpioCallbacks[16] = {0};
00050

00052  ******************************   PROTOTYPES   *********************************

00062 /***************************************************************************/
00067 void GPIOINT_Init(void)
00068 {
00069   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(GPIO_ODD_IRQn);
00070   NVIC_EnableIRQ(GPIO_ODD_IRQn);
00071   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(GPIO_EVEN_IRQn);
00072   NVIC_EnableIRQ(GPIO_EVEN_IRQn);
00073 }
00074

00076 /***************************************************************************/
00091 void GPIOINT_CallbackRegister(uint8_t pin, GPIOINT_IrqCallbackPtr_t callbackPtr)
00092 {
00093   INT_Disable();
00094 
00095   /* Dispatcher is used */
00096   gpioCallbacks[pin] = callbackPtr;
00097 
00098   INT_Enable();
00099 }
00100 
00103 /***************************************************************************/
00116 static void GPIOINT_IRQDispatcher(uint32_t iflags)
00117 {
00118   uint32_t irqIdx;
00119   GPIOINT_IrqCallbackPtr_t callback;
00120 
00121   /* check for all flags set in IF register */
00122   while(iflags)
00123   {
00124     irqIdx = EFM32_CTZ(iflags);
00125 
00126     /* clear flag*/
00127     iflags &= ~(1 << irqIdx);
00128 
00129     callback = gpioCallbacks[irqIdx];
00130     if (callback)
00131     {
00132       /* call user callback */
00133       callback(irqIdx);
00134     }
00135   }
00136 }
00137 
00138 /***************************************************************************/
00144 void GPIO_EVEN_IRQHandler(void)
00145 {
00146   uint32_t iflags;
00147 
00148   /* Get all even interrupts. */
00149   iflags = GPIO_IntGetEnabled() & 0x00005555;
00150 
00151   /* Clean only even interrupts. */
00152   GPIO_IntClear(iflags);
00153 
00154   GPIOINT_IRQDispatcher(iflags);
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 /***************************************************************************/
00164 void GPIO_ODD_IRQHandler(void)
00165 {
00166   uint32_t iflags;
00167 
00168   /* Get all odd interrupts. */
00169   iflags = GPIO_IntGetEnabled() & 0x0000AAAA;
00170 
00171   /* Clean only even interrupts. */
00172   GPIO_IntClear(iflags);
00173 
00174   GPIOINT_IRQDispatcher(iflags);
00175 }
